plot: A look at the final days of Italian filmmaker Pier Paolo Pasolini and the confusion surrounding his death in 1975.
title: Pasolini

plot_en: A look at the final days of Italian filmmaker Pier Paolo Pasolini and the confusion surrounding his death in 1975.
